query.statement:
SELECT A.PJT AS PSPID, C.ZSITE_NM, A.PJT || A.HNO AS POSID, A.SEQNO, B.NAMET AS PMNM, (A.T_DATE || ' ' || A.T_TIME) AS T_DT, (A.M_DATE || ' ' || A.M_TIME) AS M_DT, (SELECT X.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.USERNUMB = A.M_USER) AS M_USER,
VALUE((SELECT X3.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.VBELN = X2.VBELN INNER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS X3 ON X3.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X3.KUNNR = X2.KUNNR WHERE X1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X1.ZZPJT_ID = A.PJT AND X2.PARVW = 'Z3'), '') AS PERNO2,
(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL001 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X.GBN = 'L' AND X.PSPID = B.POSID AND X.POSID = B.POSID_1) > 0 THEN '파일첨부' ELSE '' END ) AS FILE, A.CONF, --(CASE WHEN A.CONF_DATE = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE A.CONF_DATE END) AS CONF_DATE , A.CONF_DATE, '' AS CHECK, (CASE WHEN B.ZZSHIP1 = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE B.ZZSHIP1 END) AS ZZSHIP1, (CASE WHEN B.ZZCHAKG = 'X' THEN '확정' ELSE '' END) AS ZZCHAKG, ZSPEC1, ZSPEC2, VALUE((SELECT X.ILDAT FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT027 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X.PSPID = B.POSID AND X.POSID = B.POSID_1 AND X.BLOCK = 'C' AND X.ACTIV = '02' AND X.GUBUN = '02'), '') AS ILDAT, C.CDATE
,VALUE((SELECT MIN(X.CR_DATE) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X.HOGI = B.POSID_1 AND X.CHARACTERISTIC LIKE 'MW%' ), '') AS CR_DATE
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11076MB AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PJT = B.POSID AND A.PJT || A.HNO = B.POSID_1
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.POSID = B.POSID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.T_DATE BETWEEN #TRAN_F# AND #TRAN_T#
AND C.POSID = #PSPID#
--사무소 코드화로 인한 주석처리
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS# -- -- -- AND B.ZTEAM <> 'X' -- -- -- AND B.ZTEAM = 'X' -- --
AND B.TEMNO = #ZZPMNUM#
